DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety , tolerability efficacy oral GW679769 120 mg dose compare placebo patient ACR ( American College Rheumatology ) -defined fibromyalgia , co-morbid depression .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosis fibromyalgia ( ACR criterion ) . Nonsevere depression ( HAMD score > 14 < 24 ) . Women must commit consistent use acceptable method birth control . Exclusion criterion : Severe depression ( HAMD score > 24 ) . Unable discontinue medication pain depression . Laboratory ECG value screen outside sponsor define range . Positive stool occult blood test .
